# ReadMe

## Contribute

Write an Rmd file.  Add via a pull-request.

Each Rmd file contains one and only one entry/vignette. The title of your vignette must be at the top of your Rmd and have `#` (chapter level).  Subsequent headings should be `##`.

You can write math in normal LaTeX.

## Downloading the Rmds

* Move mouse up to header of the example you want to download.
* Click on the "pencil" icon to take you to GitHub.
* In the top right, RIGHT click on `Raw` button.
* Save as ...
